attributes.action: Anyone found to have abused their Parliamentary expenses , are not allowed to stand as an MP again.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We hear that everyone wants a closure to the expenses debacle , but I believe the only satisfactory way to achieve this is to stop any MP that abused his or her parliamentary expenses to be stopped from standing again .

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
